title: U.S. TV viewership selected games 2014 FIFA World Cup in Brazil
summary: This grouped bar chart has 8 categories for the x axis of 2014 World Cup Matches representing ESPN/ABC, and Univision.
The highest category is found at World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC) with a mean value of 13.25.
The second highest category is found at Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN) with a mean value of 12.35.

data.2014 World Cup Matches: Opening match - Brazil vs. Croatia (06/12/14)(Univision & ESPN)
Group match - USA vs. Ghana (06/17/14)(Univision & ESPN)
Group match - USA vs. Portugal (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN)
Group match - USA vs. Germany (06/22/14)(Univision & ESPN)
Round of 16 - USA vs. Belgium (07/01/14)(Univision & ESPN)
World Cup Final - Germany vs. Argentina (07/13/14)(Univision & ABC)

gold: The graph shows the TV viewership of selected games at the 2014 FIFA World Cup in Brazil . The opening match on June 12 between Brazil and Croatia had a total TV viewership of 9.5 million viewers in the United States .
